update market_question
SURVEY_ID = #{surveyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QUESTION_CONTENT = #{questionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_TYPE = #{questionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_A = #{questionA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_B = #{questionB,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_C = #{questionC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_D = #{questionD,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_TIME = #{questionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where QUESTION_ID = #{questionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update market_question set SURVEY_ID = #{surveyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QUESTION_CONTENT = #{questionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_TYPE = #{questionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_A = #{questionA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_B = #{questionB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_C = #{questionC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_D = #{questionD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_TIME = #{questionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where QUESTION_ID = #{questionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
